testcase.classname: Main Tests › Condition Class - matches function
testcase.name: should return true when field value EQUALS provided value

testcase.classname: Main Tests › Condition Class - matches function
testcase.name: should return false when field value does NOT EQUAL provided value

testcase.classname: Main Tests › Condition Class - matches function
testcase.name: should return true when field value NOT_EQUALS provided value

testcase.classname: Main Tests › Condition Class - matches function
testcase.name: should return false when field value EQUALS provided value for NOT_EQUALS condition

testcase.classname: Main Tests › Condition Class - matches function
testcase.name: should return true when all AND conditions match

testcase.classname: Main Tests › Condition Class - matches function
testcase.name: should return false when one of the AND conditions fails

testcase.classname: Main Tests › Condition Class - matches function
testcase.name: should return true when one of the OR conditions matches

testcase.classname: Main Tests › Condition Class - matches function
testcase.name: should return false when none of the OR conditions match

testcase.classname: Main Tests › Condition Class - matches function
testcase.name: should return true for complex nested conditions

testcase.classname: Main Tests › Condition Class - matches function
testcase.name: should return false for complex nested conditions when inner condition fails

testcase.classname: Main Tests › useFetchData
testcase.name: should return loading true when the payload is provided

testcase.classname: Main Tests › useFetchData
testcase.name: should return loading false and data when fetchData is successful

testcase.classname: Main Tests › useFetchData
testcase.name: should handle no payload gracefully

testcase.classname: Main Tests › useValidateCondition
testcase.name: should return visible as true when conditionsConfig is not provided

testcase.classname: Main Tests › useValidateCondition
testcase.name: should return loading as true when useFetchData is loading

testcase.classname: Main Tests › useValidateCondition
testcase.name: should return visible as true when condition matches

testcase.classname: Main Tests › useValidateCondition
testcase.name: should return visible as false when condition does not match

testcase.classname: Main Tests › withVisibility HOC
testcase.name: should render the Placeholder when loading is true

testcase.classname: Main Tests › withVisibility HOC
testcase.name: should render the Component when loading is false and visible is true

testcase.classname: Main Tests › withVisibility HOC
testcase.name: should render null when loading is false and visible is false
